name: Slime Builder
description:
This game was made for the score space game jam 2021.

Make a slime to the given sample by combining the right coulour, shape and eyes. Click on the floating item to select them for you slime. The time is running quickly. The more time is left the more point you get.

Designed by Team Carrot, sound created by Everett Fischer (great job, thanks Everett!)

If game doesn't start try reload or play at

http://www.games-encyclo.com/SlimeBuilder/

http://www.slowakisch.co.at/test/
